storyInfo: Back in the city, Saria is about to destroy the power armor, only for the Doctor to stop her at the last minute, saving Muelsyse within. At the test site, the group finally makes it into Dorothy's lab, at which point the Pioneers level their crossbows at her.

attributes.text: The cramped space is filled with black, which blocks out light, air and sound.
The scorching heat of Originium blocks the windpipe, preventing even a whisper from escaping.
Cold hard steel clamps down on the limbs, preventing any attempt at movement, never mind resistance.
If only tears would flow from the eyes. Mother always said tears were powerful weapons.
But the eyes are not cooperating.
They have seen too many mountains fall and too many rivers dry up over the centuries. They have seen too many loved ones die.
They have become dry, like the land after a nomadic city has passed through.

attributes.content: All six power armors disabled.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Is that the last one?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Looks like it. We were delayed thirteen minutes.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Scans show a seventh!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's headed your way, Doctor!
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You did not see how Saria moved. All you know is that she was standing in front of you before you knew it.
You know she never carries a Rhine-made shield on the streets of Columbia.
She turns herself into a shield.
The enamel barrier growing from her crossed forearms blocks the power armor's attack.
Pest.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You hear Saria mutter under her breath.
That is how she views such rogue Columbian technology.
Her expression tells you what her next move is.
Saria wastes no time dealing with pests.
Her hand closes upon the chest of the power armor, where a dark hole would soon appear.
The power armor would be destroyed, or more aptly, die.
A thought comes to your mind.
She may or may not have heard more than the first syllable, but she does, in fact, stop.
It is the result of trust that you have accumulated over the course of many battles.
Her fist only scrapes the core, but the shockwave is enough to shatter the power armor's outer shell.
You see something amongst the flying metal shards that looks different.
It looks like... strands of hair.
Doctor! Look ou—
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: It's...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The power armor tips over.
As it further disintegrates, you see more hair, then a speck of skin, then an eye.
The eye is looking at you.
You see many emotions flash across it: anger, fear, bewilderment...
As the shell falls away completely, you realize it is begging for help.
You extend your hand.
What's happening, Myers?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I... I don't know, sir...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Let Doc Moore go.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Doc...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I can't.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Disobeying a direct order?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Why are you on their side, sir?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Didn't you say we needed to harden our hearts and do what we had to do? Didn't you say we were just their test subjects?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: This was all your idea. I... I liked Doc Moore.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I never thought you'd be the one to turn against me first.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sam, maybe, or somebody else... but you, Myers, you always listened to me.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: To a fault, you said.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: I listened to my boss at the plant and ended up with Oripathy. Then I started listening to you when I got here.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: You're all smart, got an education. Figured I couldn't go wrong listening to you.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: But now... we're all gonna die.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: The whitecoats are gonna kill us, Sonny! They think they got it all under control!
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Search her if you don't believe me. I'm damned sure she's got a voice recorder on her. She's here to log us, and the silver monsters.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Dr. Urbica, if you know a way out of this, it's time to get talking.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Elena...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Olivia, I may not have told you the details of the experiment...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: But I'll never lie to you.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I never lied to you either, Sonny, Myers.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I... I don't know how to deal with them.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I studied them and recorded their behavior because I wanted to solve the problem we're facing... like I said, it's part of my job.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I think Elena's telling the truth, Myers.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Would you give Joyce back to us?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ha... haha....
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: The Pioneer stares at Ptilopsis. Suddenly, he raises his hand.
Silence lets out a mute cry. Her drone rams the Pioneer, sensing its master's will.
But all he did was take something from Ptilopsis's hand.
It was the treatment band that he put on her only a few hours ago.
What... what have I done...?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Doc Moore...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: You regret it, huh? The kindness you showed me?
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Someone like me doesn't deserve kindness.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: The doctor returns to the side of her friends, still quiet, beautiful, pristine.
But there is no way out. This lab is a tomb, built specially for them.
There is no hope. The band is like a handcuff the company has shackled them with.
They will never find freedom, unless...
The Pioneer stuffs the medical wristband into his mouth.
Myers!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: S-Sir...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: What are you doing! Spit it out, now!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The band...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It contains multiple doses of painkillers.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: His heart can't possibly take it. It'll kill him!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I've seen guys swallow these...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: They're all dead!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: The dead are the lucky ones...
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Spit it out, damn you!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I'll hold his jaw. Sock him in the stomach, Sam!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: One more time! I see the treatment band!
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Olivia, let's help—
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...Olivia?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...Joyce.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: —Program start.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: She's awake?!
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's so dark...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Why is it so dark outside...?
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Dark? But all the lights are on.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Joyce... are your eyes okay?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: ...Light.
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Light... need light... warmth...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Forward...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Fearless...
attributes.name: Ptilopsis

attributes.content: Can you hear us?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: She can't.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I don't know, but none of that sounds like Joyce.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Her condition...
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I know her. She's never sounded like this, before or after the operation.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You're surprised. You don't know what's happening to her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That means the situation has long gone out of your control.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Elena... it's time to talk about these experiments.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Did Dorothy...?
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: I don't want to see anyone get hurt because of our work. Especially not Joyce.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: Maybe you're right. We should have worked together to solve the problem.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: It's ok, Elena. No need to hesitate anymore.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: I invited all of you here. You have the right to know the truth, both Dr. Silence, and my Pioneer friends.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: You were... spying on us?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: I was concerned.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Someone needs to close the doors while you stop to talk.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: You stopped the silver monsters?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Don't call them that, Sonny.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: They can hear you.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Elena, my dear assistant, there's one more thing that I require of you.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Bring them to me.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: What you don't feel comfortable explaining, I can.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: And you know my lab is the safest.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: No hostiles left outside.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: They all followed Mr. Sonny and Dr. Silence.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Communications are still out.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Looks like jamming across all standard frequencies. Mechanist might have been able to do something about it...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Mr. Sonny?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Freeze.
That voice...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Miss Mary?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Looks like you've got a decent memory.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Why... why are you here?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Where is he?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: He... you mean Mr. Sonny?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Tell him to show himself and stop hiding behind a child like a coward!
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Er, I'm a grown man...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Just barely.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Out with it, boy. Where are they?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: The Pioneers are in a building nearby...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Do you know your ears twitch when you're embarrassed?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Er... huh?
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Just kidding.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: But you're a little too trusting, aren't you?
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: This will go a lot easier if you tell me everything you know.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: Otherwise, since you're the one who fixed the power supply, I can arrest you for obstruction of justice.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: If I can't catch the real perp, I guess you'll have to do.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: No, please... don't...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: I-I don't want to cause trouble for the Doctor.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: Then what are you waiting for? Start talking.
attributes.name: Mary

attributes.content: I'm not sure if you'll believe me...
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: We were attacked by a bunch of silver shapeshifters, the likes of which we've never seen before.
attributes.name: Greyy

attributes.content: So, she's inside.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yes. This is Dorothy's lab, and the heart of the complex.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: You sure?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: What's the matter, Sonny?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: It's wicked stressful, getting so close to the truth.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Remember what I said, Sam. Be ready.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Pioneer Team Member

attributes.content: Can you open the door, Dr. Urbica?
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (Elena.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (Huh?)
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (Something feels off with the Pioneers.)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: (But we've come this far.)
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (You convinced me that we're all here to solve the same problem, Olivia.)
attributes.name: Elena

attributes.content: (I'm not so sure anymore...)
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Clock's ticking, Doctor.
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Same here.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Come in, please.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Elena's hand never touched the scanner.
But the doors of the lab open to the true master of the house.
Hello, everyone.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: I'm the Director of Rhine Lab's Originium Art Section, and the overseer of Test Site 359.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: Welcome, all, to my laboratory.
attributes.name: Dorothy

attributes.content: So we're here at last...
attributes.name: Sonny

attributes.content: Sam. Get her!
attributes.name: Sonny
